price: 19. Ama (waa) sida roob darar ah ka yimaada daruuraha oo wata gudcurro madow, onkod, iyo hillaac: waxay geliyaan farahooda xagga dhegahooda biriqyada dartood baqe ay ka qabaan mowdka.  Allena waa ku hareersan yahay gaalada (iyo munaafiqiinta).
arabic: أَوۡ كَصَيِّبٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فِيهِ ظُلُمَٰتٞ وَرَعۡدٞ وَبَرۡقٞ يَجۡعَلُونَ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِم مِّنَ ٱلصَّوَٰعِقِ حَذَرَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۚ وَٱللَّهُ مُحِيطُۢ بِٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: aw kaṣayyibin mina al-samāi fīhi ẓulumātun waraʿdun wabarqun yajʿalūna aṣābiʿahum fī ādhānihim mina al-ṣawāʿiqi ḥadhara al-mawti wal-lahu muḥīṭun bil-kāfirīna
